>Since I don't have a compiler on my system and I reallly want 
to play the new version of Gladiator, is there a chance that somebody 
will compile it for Windows and place on Yahoo or snowstorm or 
anywhere?  Thanks in advance.

There isn't enough space left for our group files to hold another 
program. [~95% of is being used to hold a version of Gladiator:Beyond 
Freedom] and the rest of the space I would prefer to leave open for 
people to upload new scenarios.
